summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functional image augmentation operations of the Albumentations library, including contrast, CLAHE, equalization, geometric transforms, color space conversions, compression, noise, and other utilities across various image shapes, data types, and parameter configurations.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of image preprocessing functions used in computerâ€‘vision pipelines, preventing regressions and guaranteeing consistent behavior across diverse input scenarios.
